casebody.data:
IN RE: Alex Ohara KING No. 128P17 Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 8, 2017 Alex Ohara King, for King, Alex Ohara. Amy Kunstling Irene, Special Deputy Attorney General, Jon David, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Defendant on the 19th of April 2017 in this matter for a writ of mandamus, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the Superior Court, Brunswick County:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 8th of June 2017."
